title: Liang Fu Joins Sucden Financial HK as its Senior Account Executive
text:
Liang Fu Joins Sucden Financial HK as its Senior Account Executive Liang Fu Joins Sucden Financial HK as its Senior Account Executive In his new role at Sucden Financial HK, Mr. Fu will help will service, bolster, and foster the group’s Asian client base. Advertising Print This Post 
Sucden Financial (HK) Limited, a Hong Kong subsidiary of Sucden Financial Limited, has appointed Liang Fu as its newest Senior Account Executive, according to a Sucden Financial statement. 
In his new role at Sucden Financial HK, Mr. Fu will help will service, bolster, and foster the group’s Asian client base in the region. He joins Sucden Financial from NewEdge and Jefferies, having been based out of Hong Kong. Additionally, he has also worked at Xi’an Maike Metals. 
Mr. Liang’s appointment follows on the heels of Steven Ren’s departure, who recently parted ways with Sucden Financial to pursue other activities in the financial services industry, snapping a five-year tenure. 
According to Jeremy Goldwyn, Non-Executive Director of Sucden Financial Limited in a recent statement on the appointment, “We are delighted to have secured Liang Fu’s services. He has been known to us for a long time and has been filling an equivalent role at an active competitor for a similar time period. He is already familiar with many of our clients and will be able to bring a fresh perspective to our customer servicing. He joins 11 other colleagues in the HK office and will work closely with the London-based Chinese team. 
“We all wish Steven well and we look to continue building on our success in Mainland China with Liang Fu,” he added.
